snippet.title: Mute Crimson DX Trailer
snippet.description:
Mute Crimson DX is an action-packed precision platformer where you guide Ninja on his quest to climb up walls, slice through bad guys and overcome great evils!
-
Available August 16th on Steam, Nintendo Switch, Xbox and PlayStation 5!

Steam :  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2830430/Mute_Crimson_DX/
Nintendo Switch : https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/mute-crimson-dx-switch/
Xbox : https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/mute-crimson-dx/9pm4dx0m36jt
PlayStation 5 : https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011318
-
Iced Lizard Games is a very small independent game developer making the kind of games we love!
